Question: Dongguan Canyu Image Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Dongguan Canyu Image Technology Co., Ltd.

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Specializes in customized development of camera filters and photographic equipment accessories
- Produces six categories of products including DJI drone filters, camera filters, smartphone filters, and various hardware structural components
- Committed to providing diverse product choices for photography enthusiasts to meet different shooting needs and scenes
